body.p: It is possible to create any custom element. This element have to belong to osm: namespace
We want to create an element that display an alert msg on click.
body.pre: <button caption="click here" msg="this is an alert message!!!"/>
body.p: The xslt transformation saved in custombutton.xsl [osml/plugins/custombuttom.xsl]
body.pre: <xsl:template match="osm:custombutton"> <input type="button"> <xsl:attribute name="value"><xsl:value-of select="@caption"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="onclick">alert('<xsl:value-of select="@msg"/>')</xsl:attribute> </input> </xsl:template>
body.p: to include these transformation instructions to othello we have to modify core.xsl
